Location: HYBRID HEARING - Council Chambers - City Hall
Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Fire and Emergency Management and Special Committee on Twin Parks Citywide Taskforce on Fire Prevention

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Fire and Emergency Management and Special Committee on Twin Parks Citywide Taskforce on Fire Prevention
Oversight - Agency Enforcement and the Twin Parks Fire.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Agency Enforcement and the Twin Parks Fire.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to defining the term self-closing door
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to self-closing door corrections and certification, and penalties for self-closing door violations
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the sale of electric space heaters
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to minimum temperatures required to be maintained in dwellings
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Minimum temperatures required to be maintained in dwellings.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the fire department to conduct residential education and outreach regarding the safe operation of electric space heaters
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the fire dept to conduct residential education and outreach regarding the safe operation of electric space heaters.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to permit filing fees for one-, two-, and three-family dwellings damaged by a fire
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Requiring the commissioner of buildings to waive filing fees for permits to alter family dwellings to conform to the NYC fire code.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York and the New York city building code, in relation to requiring carbon monoxide detecting devices in the basements of certain dwellings
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Requiring carbon monoxide detecting devices in the basements of certain dwellings.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to inspections of self-closing doors and fire safety notices in residential buildings
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Inspections of self-closing doors and fire safety notices in residential buildings.

Oversight - Agency Enforcement and the Twin Parks Fire.
